paper_abstract: A novel algorithm for source location by utilizing the time-difference-of-arrival (TDOA) of a signal received at spatially separated sensors is proposed. The algorithm is based on the constrained total least-squares (CTLS) technique and gives an explicit solution. Simulation results demonstrate that the proposed algorithm hits high location accuracy and its performance is close to the Cramer-Rao lower bound (CRLB).
paper_title: Constrained Total Least-Squares Algorithm for Hyperbolic Location
